experience.text: I got a pleasure to be hired as a part-time employee in Prague based company where I started working in Vue 2 and 3, mostly focusing on upgrading their big projects to vue 3.

I had an opportunity to contribute to numerous large-scale projects primarily Next.js and typescript, communicating with backend through openAPI and swagger. Worked with Redux toolkit more closely and got introduced to material UI and ANT fields.
Working as a freelance front-end developer for a design office based in London, building webpages with Gatsby and React for various customers.
My responsibilities included rebuilding and optimizing two extensive websites using Jekyll, generating content from markdown files, and performing frontend maintenance tasks.
I crafted small websites and handled various front-end tasks for clients, mainly focusing on HTML, CSS, and working with various CMS platforms.

references.title: NGP Prague
references.text: in 2023 I started learning Vue and while working as a freelancer for Brainz Discruptive based in Prague I have upgraded large and beatiful website for National Gallery Prague from Options API & Vue 2 to Vue 3 in composition API

references.title: Nåbø Aarhus
references.text: interactive map (integrated OpenStreetMap API). for collecting cultural institutions scattered all over the city of Aarhus and Tromso, Norway. Data are collected from google sheets. And also uploaded there through contact form

references.title: PipeGame
references.text: I coded my favourite old MS DOS game in order to get some challenge in javascript with life chart of highest scores. Current version is desktop only.

references.title: My portfolio
references.text: My own blog where I can organise my activities and illustartions into different categories. Tagging & blogging system, interactive pagination, shoping cart. Liking feature - likes stored in firebase plus Cart items & like arrays stored in local storage. Also implemented Stripe payment with own Node server hosted on Heroku. For now removed

references.title: Prague suburbs
references.text: Nine chapters about the trasitions that Prague post-soviet suburbs undertook over the years. Created my own font via react and images. Lots of custom made js animations, illustrated and designed by me, too.

references.title: Sweet City
references.text: A project built in React to promote the upcoming local elections and try to get young people more involved in the process. Implemented markdown files as a way to add new events via github repo. Generated timeline feed by running custom script.
